content: गॄ {vI.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (गृणाति, गूर्ण) {@--1@} To utter a sound, call out, invoke, नामापि नाम गृणताममृतत्वाय कल्पतां <ls>Mv. 7. 15.</ls> {@--2@} To announce, speak, utter, proclaim; <ls>R. 10. 63.</ls> {@--3@} To relate, promulgate. {@--4@} To praise, extol; केचिद्धीताः प्रांजलयो गृणंति <ls>Bg. 11. 21</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 77.</ls> --WITH अनु to encourage; <ls>Bk. 8. 77.</ls> {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (गिरति or गिलति) {@--1@} To swallow, devour, eat up. {@--2@} To send forth, pour out, spit out, or eject, from the mouth. --WITH अव (<ab>Atm.</ab>) to eat, devour; तथावगिरमाणैश्च पिशाचैर्मांसशोणितं <ls>Bk. 8. 30.</ls> {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (गारयते) {@--1@} To make known, relate. {@--2@} To teach.
